Subset_Questions.name: Question Template for Subsets
Subset_Questions.Q0: What is the ID of the Subset?
Subset_Questions.Q1: What is the name of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Q2: When was the subset last updated?
Subset_Questions.Q3: What is the modality of the subset? (The type of data)
Subset_Questions.Q4: What is the format or the schema of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Q5: What is the size of the subset? (Number of rows if it's a table or files if it's a directory)
Subset_Questions.Q6: What is the ID of the parent of the subset? (Use 0 if none)
Subset_Questions.Q7: What is the purpose of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Q8: What is the link (URL) to further description of the subset?

Feature_Questions.name: Question Template for Features
Feature_Questions.Q0: What is the ID of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q1: What is the ID of the reference subset of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q2: What is the introduction date of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q3: What is the name of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Q4: What are the values that the feature might take?
Feature_Questions.Q5: What special meaning does NA, NULL, NONE, or any other placeholder have with respect to this feature?
Feature_Questions.Q6: What is the meaning of the feature if it is zero?
Feature_Questions.Q7: What does it mean if no value is to be found?
Feature_Questions.Q8: What level of non-zero sparsity is there?
Feature_Questions.Q9: What is the mean if the feature is nummeric?
Feature_Questions.Q10: What is the standard deviation if the feature is numeric?
Feature_Questions.Q11: How many modes does the feature have?
Feature_Questions.Q13: What is the inter quartile range?
Feature_Questions.Q14: What is the ID of the parent feature (If derived from other features)
Feature_Questions.Q15: What unit is this feature in?
Feature_Questions.Q17: Why does the feature exist or is it superfluous?
Feature_Questions.Q18: State whether the feature is encoded and what the mapping is.

Subset_1.name: Subset 1
Subset_1.A7: One VCF file per patient describes the variation in the patients genome with respect to a common reference.

Subset_2.name: Subset 2
Subset_2.A7: Summarized biological readouts from TruCulture: induced cytokine protein levels - the functional outcome related to cell-popoulations/phenotypes and genotypes

Feature_1.name: Feature 1
Feature_1.A17: Study-specific patient ID needed to map this subset to the others.
Feature_1.A18: All start with "COVIMUN": name of study, followed by "XX": capitalized hospital code, followed by enrollment number at that hospital

Feature_2.name: Feature 2
Feature_2.A4: Two sep by _, (4013..inf; integer) representing sample number, (2020..2021; YYYY) representing sample year
Feature_2.A17: Unique ID to identify specific DuraClone sample, always connected to a single STUDY_ID

Feature_3.name: Feature 3
Feature_3.A17: Investigate longitudinal effect. Can together with STUDY_ID link samples from different subsets taken at the same time/the same date

Feature_4.name: Feature 4
Feature_4.A16: Identifies the specific flow cytometry tube from which data is derived
Feature_4.A17: Each tube has a specific set of antibody markers, enables backtracking from a feature

Feature_5.name: Feature 5
Feature_5.A16: Identifies the specific cell population and phenotype markers

Feature_6.name: Feature 6
Feature_6.A4: Many, character/string; count, concentration, or mfi
Feature_6.A16: cnt: events detected for the given variable, "con": corresponding bloodstream concentration, "mfi": mean fluorescence intensity corresponding to a marker's mean expression level
Feature_6.A17: Concentration and mean fluorescence intensity allow for comparison between samples

Feature_7.name: Feature 7
Feature_7.A5: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_7.A6: Cell population/ marker level not present or under detectible level in sample

Subset_3.name: Subset 3
Subset_3.A7: Summarized biological readouts from Duraclone: immune cell popoulation -and phenotype levels - outcome related to genotypes

Feature_1.name: Feature 1
Feature_1.A17: Study-specific patient ID needed to map this subset to the others.
Feature_1.A18: All start with "COVIMUN": name of study, followed by "XX": capitalized hospital code, followed by enrollment number at that hospital

Feature_2.name: Feature 2
Feature_2.A17: Investigate longitudinal effect. Can together with STUDY_ID link samples from different subsets taken at the same time/the same date

Feature_3.name: Feature 3
Feature_3.A17: Unique ID to identify specific TruCulture sample, always connected to a single STUDY_ID

Feature_4.name: Feature 4
Feature_4.A5: NULL means unstimulated (control for stimulated samples)
Feature_4.A16: NULL : no stimulation, "LPS" : lipopolysaccharide (bacterial stimuli), "R848" : resiquimod (viral stimuli), "PolyIC" : Polyinosinic:polycytidylic acid (viral stimuli), "HKCA" heat killed candida albicans (fungal stimuli), "CD3/CD28" T-cell stimulation (direct stimulation)
Feature_4.A17: The stimuli correspond to different infectious agents, inducing functional immune responses (cytokine release)

Feature_5.name: Feature 5
Feature_5.A5: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_5.A6: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_5.A17: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_6.name: Feature 6
Feature_6.A5: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_6.A6: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_6.A17: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_7.A5: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_7.A6: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_7.A17: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_8.A5: Measurment missing for a random reason e.g. technical error with assay
Feature_8.A6: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_8.A17: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_9.A6: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_9.A17: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible

Feature_10.A6: Cytokine protein under detectible level in sample
Feature_10.A17: Measurement of variable, potential feature/outcome varible
